queue_command.command: execute unless entity @s[m=creative] unless entity @s[m=spectator] run ability @s mayfly false

command: execute if entity @e[family=ocelot,r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute if entity @e[family=cat,r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute unless block ~ ~ ~ tallgrass if block ~ ~-1 ~ grass run event entity @s morph:sheep_start_grazing
execute if block ~ ~ ~ tallgrass run event entity @s morph:sheep_start_grazing

queue_command.command: execute unless block ~ ~-1 ~ grass unless block ~ ~ ~ tallgrass run event entity @s morph:sheep_stop_grazing

command: execute unless block ~ ~ ~ tallgrass if block ~ ~-1 ~ grass run setblock ~ ~-1 ~ dirt
execute if block ~ ~ ~ tallgrass run setblock ~ ~ ~ air
execute if entity @e[type=!minecraft:player,family=armadillo,has_property={minecraft:armadillo_state="unrolled"},r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute if entity @a[family=armadillo,has_property={morph:armadillo_state="unrolled"},r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5

queue_command.command: execute unless block ~ ~-1 ~ air unless block ~ ~-1 ~ water unless block ~ ~-1 ~ lava run fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ snow_layer replace air
execute if entity @e[family=zombie_pigman,r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5

command: execute if entity @e[type=!minecraft:player,family=armadillo,has_property={minecraft:armadillo_state="unrolled"},r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute if entity @a[family=armadillo,has_property={morph:armadillo_state="unrolled"},r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute unless block ~ ~0.5 ~ lava run effect @s levitation 0
execute unless block ~ ~0.0 ~ lava run effect @s slow_falling 0
execute if block ~ ~0.5 ~ lava run effect @s levitation 1 0 true
execute if block ~ ~0.5 ~ lava run effect @s slow_falling 1 0 true
execute if entity @e[family=ocelot,r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute if entity @e[family=cat,r=6] run camerashake add @s 0.1 0.5
execute unless entity @e[type=lightning_bolt,r=1000] run tag @s remove morph:panda.scared
execute unless entity @s[tag=morph:panda.scared] if entity @e[type=lightning_bolt,r=1000] run effect @s blindness 1 0 true
execute unless entity @s[tag=morph:panda.scared] if entity @e[type=lightning_bolt,r=1000] run camerashake add @s 0.5 1
execute if entity @e[type=lightning_bolt,r=1000] run tag @s add morph:panda.scared
execute if entity @e[family=mob,r=2.5] run event entity @s morph:pufferfish_start_half_puff
execute if entity @e[family=player,r=2.5] run event entity @s morph:pufferfish_start_half_puff
execute if entity @e[family=mob,r=2.5] run event entity @s morph:pufferfish_start_full_puff
execute if entity @e[family=player,r=2.5] run event entity @s morph:pufferfish_start_full_puff

queue_command.command: execute unless entity @e[family=mob,r=2.9] unless entity @e[family=player,r=2.9] run event entity @s morph:pufferfish_from_full_puff
execute unless entity @s[m=creative] unless entity @s[m=spectator] run ability @s mayfly true
